attributes.additional_details: The public is unhappy with not just Boris Johnson, but the Conservative party as a whole. Allowing them to usurp the current PM and elect another leader/PM is just another way of allowing them to shrug of the events of the past few years without any real consequences. They continue in power despite the fact they abused/supported/ defended or ignored what was happening within their own party. It was a betrayal of the electorates trust and they should be allowed the opportunity to rectify that
attributes.background: Hold a general election; the current government is in chaos, and although the PM has now agreed to step down, he is to be replaced by another party representative who was a supporter and defender to the chaos of the past few years.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/619781
